function.name: categories_list_for_wayfair
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "wayfair", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "List categories and their recursive children categories if available"

caid.description: The value of categoryId fields returned right in this endpoint. The default root category is 214970.

function.name: reviews_list_for_wayfair
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "wayfair", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "List reviews relating to specific product"

sku.description: The value of sku fields returned in .../products/list or .../products/search endpoint.

function.name: products_list_for_wayfair
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "wayfair", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "List products with filters and options"

categoryid.description: The value of categoryId fields returned in .../categories/list endpoint

currentzipcode.description: The postal code to get near available products.

sortid.description: Check availableSorts field returned right in this endpoint for suitable sortId

filterstringunencoded.description: The value of filterStringUnencoded fields returned right in this endpoint to filter products, pass this parameter multiple times for multiple filters. Ex : ...&filterStringUnencoded=a1234567890~2147483646&filterStringUnencoded=at_style~Tiffany&...

function.name: products_search_for_wayfair
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "wayfair", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Search for products by term or phrase"

keyword.description: Any term or phrase to look for relating products

filters.description: The value of filter_string_unencoded fields returned right in this endpoint to filter products, pass this parameter multiple times for multiple filters. Ex : ...&filters=colorList~White&filters=masterClID~180&...

sortby.description: The value of sort_value fields returned right in this endpoint. Default is 0

function.name: auto_complete_for_wayfair
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "wayfair", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get auto suggestions by term or phrase"

query.description: Any term or phrase that you are familiar with

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

train_messages.content:
You are AutoGPT, you can use many tools(functions) to do the following task.
First I will give you the task description, and your task start.
At each step, you need to give your thought to analyze the status now and what to do next, with a function call to actually excute your step.
After the call, you will get the call result, and you are now in a new state.
Then you will analyze your status now, then decide what to do next...
After many (Thought-call) pairs, you finally perform the task, then you can give your finial answer.
Remember: 
1.the state change is irreversible, you can't go back to one of the former state, if you want to restart the task, say "I give up and restart".
2.All the thought is short, at most in 5 sentence.
3.You can do more then one trys, so if your plan is to continusly try some conditions, you can do one of the conditions per try.
Let's Begin!
Task description: You should use functions to help handle the real time user querys. Remember:
1.ALWAYS call "Finish" function at the end of the task. And the final answer should contain enough information to show to the user,If you can't handle the task, or you find that function calls always fail(the function is not valid now), use function Finish->give_up_and_restart.
2.Do not use origin tool names, use only subfunctions' names.
You have access of the following tools:
1.wayfair: This API helps to query for all information about categories, products, etc… as on wayfair.com
